recipe.title: Parmesan-Crusted Chicken
ingredients: 1/2 cup Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (about 1 1/4 lbs.)
4 tsp. Italian seasoned dry bread crumbs
instructions: Combine Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise with cheese in medium bowl. Arrange chicken on baking sheet. Evenly top with Mayonnaise mixture, then sprinkle with bread crumbs.
Bake until chicken is thoroughly cooked, about 20 minutes.
This recipe is made available as a courtesy by Hellmann's®.
